summary: This document is an email chain from February 2, 2021, regarding a news report that Ghislaine Maxwell, while in detention at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC), had recently received a COVID-19 vaccine. The email is forwarded within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY) for awareness, with a note questioning its relevance to their purview.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email; a source reports she recently received a COVID-19 vaccine while incarcerated at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC).

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell receives COVID-19 vaccine in detention
events.description: A source reports that Ghislaine Maxwell recently received a COVID-19 vaccine while detained at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC). A news organization intends to publish a story about it.

keyFacts: In early February 2021, Ghislaine Maxwell was reported to have received a COVID-19 vaccine while in custody at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC).
This information came from a source to a news organization, which planned to publish a story on the same day.
The information was forwarded within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY), with an internal note questioning its relevance to their official duties.
